# react/jsx-key <Badge type="info" text="Correctness" />

<div class="rule-meta">
<Alert class="default-on" type="success">
<span class="emoji">âœ…</span> This rule is turned on by default.
</Alert>
</div>

### What it does

Enforce `key` prop for elements in array

### Example

```jsx
// Bad
[1, 2, 3].map((x) => <App />);
[1, 2, 3]
  ?.map((x) => <BabelEslintApp />)

  [
    // Good
    (1, 2, 3)
  ].map((x) => <App key={x} />);
[1, 2, 3]?.map((x) => <BabelEslintApp key={x} />);
```
